Skype is free internet =
phone from Pc to Pc. You can download it for free at www.skype.comI'm keypo=
rtparanormal on there and maybe we can involve you in a future box session =
over skype.-Steve H.--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Michael Edwards <f1crac=
ker75@...> wrote:>> What is a Skype session?> > > > Steve Hultay <urkel23@.=
..> wrote:> Mike,> > I haven't done that personally, because i don't think =
that the > communication is at the point to receive full sentences. You get=
 a > couple words here and there that we can piece together to make > somew=
hat of a sentence, but i don't believe anybody has reached that > stage yet=
. If i got a full sentence that would be great, but it > probably wouldn't =
be clear enough to post on the board. If i have to > explain what it says t=
o convince people to hear it, than it' s > probably nothing. When in doubt,=
 throw the file out. I try to form > the questions for the most part in Yes=
 and No format, it seems they > can always respond with yes and no. I do ge=
t other stuff that is > good, but i try and keep it simple for them. And fr=
ank just sits > back and listens without asking questions allowing them to =
get that > message across. I prefer to ask questions, because i know when t=
o > wait for a response. The Skype session i had with my Joe's box last > f=
riday with Juli and Joel was a great example of getting good > communicatio=
n. We were getting answers to all our questions and > that "Frank Sumption"=
 file was one of the clearest i have ever heard > come through my Joe's Box=
 #2, which is now broken again. Juli has > all the audio and will post more=
 as she goes through it for everybody > to hear.> > -Steve H.> > --- In EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Michael Edwards <f1cracker75@> > wrote:> >> > Hi Stev=
e, hope all is well with you.> > > > From this site it appears that yoursel=
f, Frank, Bruce, and > Kristin and others I can not think of at the moment,=
 have been > engaged in contact as such that you ask a question and they gi=
ve an > answer. Have any of you ever taken the info you receive from lets s=
ay > one spirit and tried to contact their living relative to give them a >=
 copy of the recording? Have spirits asked you more experienced > researche=
rs to do that, and if so, was the person you contacted > indeed the correct=
 loved one, and what was their response in you > contacting them? I think t=
his would be awesome to be able to serve > as a messenger to the deceased> =
> > > Mike Edwards Cary NC> > > > Steve Hultay <urkel23@> wrote:> > I heard=
 "Help" twice and than "Lord". The second "help" > is in the > > static whi=
te noise area after the first really clear one.> > > > -Steve H.> > > > ---=
